creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: mass of green, yellow, purple, plum, rust, and teal in horizontal orientation at center of sheet; circular indigo formation with smaller black square forms arranged in a circular orientation overlaid with green, pink, and yellow to form a flowerlike composition within the mass at L; sweeping strokes of green and yellow over top and bottom of mass; smaller irregular green and rust colored formation at LR, behind center mass
signed: LRC, in pencil: [Passionate of the water fowl / Rikio Takahashi / 1966]
title: Passionate of the Water Fowl
